languages.text: "Это бесчеловечно. Приказываю немедленно отказаться от этих варварских методов".
"It is inhumane. I order that you immediately cease using these barbaric methods."
languages.original_text: "Это бесчеловечно. Приказываю немедленно отказаться от этих варварских методов".

traits.locale_text: "It is inhumane. I order that you immediately cease using these barbaric methods."
"It is inhumane. I order that you immediately cease using these barbaric methods."
"It is inhumane. I order that you immediately cease using these barbaric methods."
"It is inhumane. I order that you immediately cease using these barbaric methods."
"It is inhumane. I order that you immediately cease using these barbaric methods."

languages.text: “这种做法太不人道了，我命令你们立刻停止这种野蛮行为。”
languages.original_text: "It is inhumane. I order that you immediately cease using these barbaric methods."

traits.locale_text: “这种做法太不人道了，我命令你们立刻停止这种野蛮行为。”

languages.text: «Es inhumano. Le ordeno que cese inmediatamente de emplear estos métodos tan bárbaros».
languages.original_text: "It is inhumane. I order that you immediately cease using these barbaric methods."

traits.locale_text: «Es inhumano. Le ordeno que cese inmediatamente de emplear estos métodos tan bárbaros».

languages.text: 「非人道的だ。このような野蛮な方法を直ちにやめるよう命じる」
languages.original_text: "It is inhumane. I order that you immediately cease using these barbaric methods."

traits.locale_text: 「非人道的だ。このような野蛮な方法を直ちにやめるよう命じる」

languages.text: "Das ist unmenschlich. Ich befehle Euch, diese barbarischen Methoden umgehend zu unterlassen."
languages.original_text: "It is inhumane. I order that you immediately cease using these barbaric methods."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist unmenschlich. Ich befehle Euch, diese barbarischen Methoden umgehend zu unterlassen."

languages.text: « C'est tout bonnement inhumain. Je vous ordonne de renoncer immédiatement à vos méthodes barbares. »
languages.original_text: "It is inhumane. I order that you immediately cease using these barbaric methods."

traits.locale_text: « C'est tout bonnement inhumain. Je vous ordonne de renoncer immédiatement à vos méthodes barbares. »

languages.text: "İnsanlık dışı bir şey bu. Derhâl bu barbarca yöntemleri kullanmayı kesmeni emrediyorum."
languages.original_text: "It is inhumane. I order that you immediately cease using these barbaric methods."
